price: Човек говори: „Зар ћу, кад умрем, заиста да будем проживљен?“
arabic: وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَءِذَا مَا مِتُّ لَسَوۡفَ أُخۡرَجُ حَيًّا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlu al-insānu a-idhā mā mittu lasawfa ukh'raju ḥayyan
